pages.title: 404 Not Found
pages.text: SORRY, BUT YOU SEEM TO GET TO THE DESERT WITHOUT KNOWLEDEG... THE PAGE YOU WANT TO FIND MAY BE DELETED OR NOT EXIST. - YOU CAN CLICK HERE BACK TO HOME PAGE. - YOU CAN CLICK HERE TO REMIND AUTHOR. STARS

pages.title: about
pages.text: A little STAR from an island. 敬请阁下留意推荐优先使用 chromium 内核浏览器阅读本博客，以保证用户体验作者专攻非计算机学科，并且性情懒惰，因此博客正处于并将长期处于调整状态。若有任何变动，恕不另行通知。没有系统接触过港澳台繁体的使用习惯，姑且先用香港繁体作为语言显示选项，但是请勿过分咬文嚼字，若有意思表达不清或者歧义，请反馈在相应文章下方评论区，感谢您的支持！

pages.title: CONTACT
pages.text: You can contact Author by comments here. You comments are always welcomed. 管理人に連絡する場合は、こちらでコメントいただけます。いつもお待ちしております。 您可以在此通過評論系統聯絡管理員。一直都會歡迎您提出的意見！ 您能夠在此利用評論系統連絡部落格作者。一如既往歡迎您提出的意見！ 您可以在这里通过评论系统联系博主。至始至终欢迎您提出的意见！ NOTICE 温馨提醒Please login to GitHub, LiveRe or Disqus account to comment.敬請登錄 吉特哈布 、 來必力 或者 迪斯卡司 賬戶後評論

posts.title: video-test
posts.text: This is an example of video player tests. (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer0"),"loop":true,"screenshot":true,"hotkey":true,"preload":"true","video":{"url":"/undefined/5cfa907f/trailer.mp4"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})() Example_I-Don't-Know-the-Actual-Language12345678dplayer options: 'autoplay', 'loop', 'screenshot', 'hotkey', 'mutex', 'dmunlimited' : bool options, use "yes" "y" "true" "1" "on" or just without value to enable 'preload', 'theme', 'lang', 'logo', 'url', 'pic', 'thumbnails', 'vidtype', 'suburl', 'subtype', 'subbottom', 'subcolor', 'subcolor', 'id', 'api', 'token', 'addition', 'dmuser' : string arguments 'volume', 'maximum' : number argumentscontainer options: 'width', 'height' : string, used in container element styleother: 'code' : value of this key will be append to script tag Example_I-Don't-Know-the-Actual-Language12{% dplayer "url=https://moeplayer.b0.upaiyun.com/dplayer/hikarunara.mp4" "addition=https://dplayer.daoapp.io/bilibili?aid=4157142" "api=https://api.prprpr.me/dplayer/" "pic=https://moeplayer.b0.upaiyun.com/dplayer/hikarunara.jpg" "id=9E2E3368B56CDBB4" "loop=yes" "theme=#FADFA3" "autoplay=false" "token=tokendemo" %}{% dplayer 'url=some.mp4' "id=someid" "api=https://api.prprpr.me/dplayer/" "addition=/some.json" 'code=player.on("loadstart",function(){console.log("loadstart")})' "autoplay" %} Raw-Dplayer_Example_I-Don't-Know-the-Actual-Language123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748{% raw %}<div id="dplayer" className="dplayer"></div><link class="dplayer-css" rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/dplayer/dist/DPlayer.min.css"><script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/dplayer/dist/DPlayer.min.js"></script><script> var dp = new DPlayer({ container: document.querySelector('#dplayer'), autoplay: false, theme: '#FADFA3', loop: true, screenshot: true, hotkey: true, logo: 'logo.png', volume: 0.7, mutex: true, video: { url: 'demo.mp4', pic: 'demo.png', thumbnails: 'thumbnails.jpg', type: 'auto' }, subtitle: { url: 'webvtt.vtt', type: 'webvtt', fontSize: '25px', bottom: '10%', color: '#b7daff' }, danmaku: { id: 'demo', api: 'https://api.prprpr.me/dplayer/', token: 'demo', maximum: 3000, user: 'DIYgod', margin: { bottom: '15%' }, unlimited: true }, contextmenu: [ { text: 'custom contextmenu', link: 'https://github.com/MoePlayer/DPlayer' } ] });</script>{% endraw %}

posts.title: music-test
posts.text: This is an example of music player tests. Example_Display_I-Don't-Know-the-Actual-Language12{% aplayer title author url [picture_url, narrow, autoplay, width:xxx, lrc:xxx] %}{% aplayer "Caffeine" "Jeff Williams" "caffeine.mp3" "autoplay" "width:70%" "lrc:caffeine.txt" %} var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-ipDlSQIC"), narrow: false, autoplay: true, showlrc: false, music: { title: "ここから、ここから", author: "玉木マリ(CV:水瀬いのり)、小淵沢報瀬(CV:花澤香菜)、 三宅日向(CV:井口裕香)、白石結月(CV:早見沙織)", url: "test-music.mp3", pic: "", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap); LRC_Example_Display_I-Don't-Know-the-Actual-Language123{% aplayerlrc "title" "author" "url" "autoplay" %}[00:00.00]lrc here{% endaplayerlrc %} Playlist_Example_Display_I-Don't-Know-the-Actual-Language123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627{% aplayerlist %}{ "narrow": false, // （可选）播放器袖珍风格 "autoplay": true, // （可选) 自动播放，移动端浏览器暂时不支持此功能 "mode": "random", // （可选）曲目循环类型，有 'random'（随机播放）, 'single' (单曲播放), 'circulation' (循环播放), 'order' (列表播放)， 默认：'circulation' "showlrc": 3, // （可选）歌词显示配置项，可选项有：1,2,3 "mutex": true, // （可选）该选项开启时，如果同页面有其他 aplayer 播放，该播放器会暂停 "theme": "#e6d0b2", // （可选）播放器风格色彩设置，默认：#b7daff "preload": "metadata", // （可选）音乐文件预载入模式，可选项： 'none' 'metadata' 'auto', 默认: 'auto' "listmaxheight": "513px", // (可选) 该播放列表的最大长度 "music": [ { "title": "CoCo", "author": "Jeff Williams", "url": "caffeine.mp3", "pic": "caffeine.jpeg", "lrc": "caffeine.txt" }, { "title": "アイロニ", "author": "鹿乃", "url": "irony.mp3", "pic": "irony.jpg" } ]}{% endaplayerlist %} MetingJS_Example_Display_I-Don't-Know-the-Actual-Language12345<!-- 简单示例 (id, server, type) -->{% meting "60198" "netease" "playlist" %}<!-- 进阶示例 -->{% meting "60198" "netease" "playlist" "autoplay" "mutex:false" "listmaxheight:340px" "preload:none" "theme:#ad7a86"%}

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
